content: Is https://github.blog/changelog/2021-10-27-enterprise-organizations-can-now-create-custom-repository-roles/ turned on for rust-lang? Will that help with https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/issues/352?
yes it's turned on! we didn't have time to experiment with it yet though

Nice! Let me know if you want any help.

I'm a little sad, I don't see a permission to transfer issues between repositories. I'd really like to be able to transfer issues to some repos where I don't have write access.
